element.name: Beginning Odometer Reading of Responding Vehicle
element.definition: The mileage (counter or odometer reading) of the vehicle at the beginning of the call (when the wheels begin moving). If EMS vehicle/unit is via water or air travel document the number in "hours" as it relates to the documentation of boat, Fixed Wing, or Rotor Craft in eDisposition.16
element.v3Comment: If a mileage counter is being used instead of an odometer, this value would be 0.
